name: thumbnail skin 111
css: .#= id #-#= thumbnailNavigation.id # .pav .t, .#= id #-#= thumbnailNavigation.id # .pdn .t, .#= id #-#= thumbnailNavigation.id # .p:hover.pdn .t{opacity:1;}

.#= id #-#= thumbnailNavigation.id # .ti {position:absolute;bottom:0px;left:0px;width:100%;height:#= thumbnailNavigation.itemHeight * 0.28 #px;line-height:#= thumbnailNavigation.itemHeight * 0.28 #px;text-align:center;font-size:#= thumbnailNavigation.fontSize #px;line-height:#= thumbnailNavigation.lineHeight #px;color:\#fff;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.3)}

.#= id #-#= thumbnailNavigation.id # .pav .ti, .#= id #-#= thumbnailNavigation.id # .pdn .ti, .#= id #-#= thumbnailNavigation.id # .p:hover.pdn .ti {color:\#000;background-color:rgba(255,255,255,.6);}
itemHtml: {1}
